Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to provide notice of its approval of applications to open street segments or intersections that have been reconstructed or resurfaced within the previous five years
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
